document.full_text: u-prince  - a storm unleashed torrential rains, mudslides and flooding in haiti, killing at least 10 people, haitian officials said on tuesday after thunderstorms pounded several caribbean countries.
document.title: rains, mudslides kill 10 in cholera-stricken haiti
lines_and_colors: u-prince  - a storm unleashed torrential rains, mudslides and flooding in haiti, killing at least 10 people, haitian officials said on tuesday after thunderstorms pounded several caribbean countries.
